news.title: Reeves says latest GDP figures 'disappointing' after economy unexpectedly shrinks for second month
news.summary: The economy contracted in May for the second month in a row, adding to pressure on the chancellor.

news.title: Unite union votes to suspend Rayner's membership over Birmingham bin strikes
news.summary: The union says it is re-examining its relationship with Labour over the long-running dispute.

news.title: Two residents die after car crashes into care home
news.summary: Two men are arrested on suspicion of manslaughter in connection with the deaths, police say.

news.title: Mystery interstellar object could be oldest known comet
news.summary: Scientists have been racing to discover the origins of 3I/Atlas since it was spotted last week.

news.title: Plans for cash Isa changes on hold after backlash
news.summary: There had been reports in recent weeks that the chancellor was going to cut the Â£20,000 limit.

news.title: MP Rupert Lowe investigated by standards watchdog
news.summary: Lowe has yet to declare money he raised to fund an inquiry into gang-based sexual exploitation.

news.title: UK-France migrant deal 'robust' against legal challenges, Cooper says
news.summary: The home secretary says the government will resist any attempts to block the deal agreed with France this week.

news.title: Chris Brown pleads not guilty to more assault charges
news.summary: The US singer attends a hearing in London over two charges relating to an alleged nightclub attack.

news.title: Chris Mason: Starmer and Macron plead for patience in an impatient world
news.summary: The UK and France have agreed a "one in, one out" deal for migrants crossing the Channel.

news.title: Kurdish PKK burns guns in big step towards ending Turkey conflict
news.summary: The ceremony took place under tight security at a cave in Iraqi Kurdistan - the disarmament process is expected to last all summer.
